metadata.title: USN-2780-1 -- MiniUPnP vulnerability
metadata.description: Aleksandar Nikolic discovered a buffer overflow vulnerability in the XML parser functionality of the MiniUPnP library. A remote attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code with privileges of the user running an application that uses the MiniUPnP library.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-2780-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libminiupnpc-dev - 1.6-3ubuntu2.14.04.2 libminiupnpc8 - 1.6-3ubuntu2.14.04.2 miniupnpc - 1.6-3ubuntu2.14.04.2 No subscription required
